nodes.text: Deara Antilles was a Human female who was the sister of Queen Breha Organa. Around 18 BBY, she served as her sister's advisor and the caretaker of Breha's adopted daughter, Leia. However, unbeknownst to her relatives, Antilles was actually working as a spy for Darth Vader, after the Sith Lord threatened her while she was on Coruscant. After she was discovered by Ferus Olin and Bail Organa, Breha had mercy on her sister and exiled her to Ankori-7.
